peril.views.slick.components.menus

Class WarMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.menus.Menu
          • peril.views.slick.components.menus.WarMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Container

    public final class WarMenu
extends Menu
    Displays the CombatHelper from the Attack to the user.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.06
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Ezekiel_Trinidad
    See Also:
    Menu, Attack, WarMenu.SlickSquad, WarMenu.SlickSquadMember

      Displays a ModelSquad to the user.

      Displays a ModelSquadMember to the user.

      Draws the attackers army so that they can select the units to add to the attacking squad.

      Draws the army strength for each ModelArmy belonging to the attacking and defending ModelCountrys.

      Draws the normal state of combat where both countries are valid for combat.

      Draws the visual of a ModelPlayer.
      private void drawTitle(Frame frame)
      Draws the names of the ModelPlayers whose ModelCountrys are attacking and defending.

      Draws the WarMenu where the attacking country has failed to conquer the other country.

      Hides this WarMenu.

      Initialises all the visual elements of WarMenu.
      void moveComponents(Point vector)
      Moves all the visual components of the WarMenu along a specified Point vector.
      private void resetWar()
      Returns the WarMenu.SlickSquad members of the defender and attacker then resets the state of the war to empty.
      void selectMaxUnits()
      Selects the ModelUnits to be WarMenu.SlickSquadMembers of the attackingSquad that will result in the strongest possible attackingSquad.
      void show()
      Makes this WarMenu visible along with its attack Button.
      private void succesfulConquer(Frame frame)
      Draws the WarMenu where the attacking country has conquered the other country.
